mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.uuid, c.parent_id AS parentId, c.slug, ct.name, ct.description FROM categories c LEFT JOIN category_translations ct ON ct.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN country cn ON cn.country_uuid = ct.country_uuid WHERE cn.country_code = #{countryCode} AND cn.language_code = #{lang} ORDER BY c.parent_id NULLS FIRST, c.id
